name: GermanTravelSecrets
0:
”Alexa, open German Travel Secrets”
”Alexa, open German Travel Secrets and reveal cultural locations”
”Alexa, open German Travel Secrets and reveal locations around Berlin”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: german travel secrets
des:
German travel secrets is the skill for Amazon Alexa which offers you much more than typical tourist attractions.
Numerous secret locations, cultural insights and ambient sounds from German cities and nature are waiting for you to reveal them.

If you have preferences for your locations, such as the region or the kind of activity, any special requirement such as child-friendly, barrier- free or sustainable locations, don’t hesitate to mention them.

Otherwise, let Alexa be your guide and be inspired by German culture & destinations!

One last tip: save your favorite locations in your travel list and receive it via Email whenever you decide to request it!

Supported by the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate action on the basis of a decision by the German Bundestag.
